analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: Caution mandated as liquidity stalls and risks rise. The GMS score of 46 confirms a neutral regime defined by credit spread expansion and liquidity convexity degradation. Strengthening DXY and commodity depreciation dictate a risk-off rotation, while the partial closure of the Strait of Hormuz injects systemic tail-risk into the fiscal-monetary nexus. Elevated VIX and collapsing sentiment necessitate a defensive posture to mitigate volatility as the market recalibrates. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]

reports.EN: Caution mandated as liquidity stalls and risks rise. The GMS score of 46 confirms a neutral regime defined by credit spread expansion and liquidity convexity degradation. Strengthening DXY and commodity depreciation dictate a risk-off rotation, while the partial closure of the Strait of Hormuz injects systemic tail-risk into the fiscal-monetary nexus. Elevated VIX and collapsing sentiment necessitate a defensive posture to mitigate volatility as the market recalibrates. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]
reports.ES: Cautela obligatoria ante estancamiento de liquidez. El GMS de 46 confirma un rÃ©gimen neutral definido por la expansiÃ³n de spreads de crÃ©dito y la degradaciÃ³n de la convexidad de liquidez. La fortaleza del DXY y la depreciaciÃ³n de materias primas dictan una rotaciÃ³n de aversiÃ³n al riesgo, mientras el cierre del Estrecho de Ormuz inyecta riesgo de cola sistÃ©mico en el nexo fiscal-monetario. El VIX elevado exige una postura defensiva para mitigar la volatilidad. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]

reports.ID: Waspada mandat karena likuiditas stagnan dan risiko. Skor GMS 46 mengonfirmasi rezim netral yang ditentukan oleh ekspansi spread kredit dan degradasi konveksitas likuiditas. Penguatan DXY dan depresiasi komoditas mendikte rotasi risk-off, sementara penutupan Selat Hormuz menyuntikkan risiko ekor sistemik ke dalam neksus fiskal-moneter. VIX yang tinggi dan sentimen yang runtuh mengharuskan posisi defensif untuk memitigasi volatilitas saat pasar melakukan rekalibrasi. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]

Der feste DXY und fallende Rohstoffpreise diktieren eine Risk-off-Rotation, wÃ¤hrend die Spannungen in der StraÃŸe von Hormuz systemische Tail-Risiken in den Fiskal-MonetÃ¤r-Nexus induzieren.
